trans-unit.source: A helper class that creates <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe auxiliar que cria instâncias <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: Once created, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator> creates new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instances, sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> and increments the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> for each successive <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instance created.
trans-unit.target: Depois de criado, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator> cria novos <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instâncias, conjuntos de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> e incrementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> para cada sucessivas <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instância criada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" /> class with the specified instance ID and sequence ID.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator" /> com a ID de instância e ID de sequência especificadas.
